text_block_list.text: On one of my days off, I dropped by the library……

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Let's see, The Complete Guide to Five-star Italian Cuisine… China's Intense Gastronomy: A Three Round Showdown… Hmm, this isn't quite what I'm after…

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Oh! Culinary Guide to Invigorating Home Cooking. Yeah, I'll check this one out today…

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Woah, Big T!? What are you doing here? 
Looking to find a few new books as well?

I guess borrowing books is what she's up to then. 
So I asked her what kind she's looking at…

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Oh, these? They're books about cooking. 
Coming up with recipes on my own has its limits, ya know.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
I come to check out books like this every once in a while, it's real 
helpful to pick up a bunch of new ideas at once. By making them 
myself, of course. Not much use just reading them.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
So, what're ya waiting for, Big T! 
Let's be off to find the ingredients we need for this!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Right, hold the basket for me so I can chuck stuff in, will ya? Let's see, first off I'll need a pumpkin, and then fish sauce. Hoh, it'll be my first time using this.
choice_data_list: You're pretty at home here, huh.
You're pretty at home here, huh.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
You bet! I'm cooking every day after all. Whenever I try a new 
recipe for something revitalizing, I get the kids to try it out. 
Seeing them wolf it down is its own reward.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Like it? Sure, you could say that, but more than 
the cooking, what I like is……

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Hang on, T, you're rather digging into this. 
Don't tell me you cook yourself as well?
choice_data_list: I like to think I'm pretty decent, at least…

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Whaaa!? So you mean…

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
You've been looking so unconcerned this whole time, but you're 
actually my rival!? Putting on this docile act… you little trickster!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Darn, and I unknowingly showed you my hand! Gaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
But… no matter. Even with my cards revealed, I'll be the one 
coming out on top! That's the Amazon way!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
It's obvious, isn't it? We're both good at cooking, and that can 
mean only one thing! A showdown!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Since we're both walking the culinary path, we gotta 
settle this between us, don't you agree?
choice_data_list: I don't think I share your enthusiasm…

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Really now, where's your spirit? In any case, now that I know 
you can cook, the fire in my heart is totally lit.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Isn't it nice to have horsegirls and trainers competing on 
the same field every once in a while? Come on, let's have 
ourselves a cooking showdown!

text_block_list.name: Referee Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: We're here borrowing the cafeteria for a cooking showdown!

text_block_list.name: Referee Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
On one side, we have our very own RA, queen of 
the kitchen, Ma'am Amazon! All of us can attest 
to her cooking prowess.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Alright, time to roll up my sleeves.

text_block_list.name: Referee Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
On the opposing side, we have Ma'am Amazon's trainer. 
You'll have to prepare something that tickles our maiden fancy 
if you want to stand a chance, Trainer! Or rather, please do♪

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Hey now, no taking advantage to slip in your own wishes!

text_block_list.name: Referee Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, my inner girliness slipped out, oopsie…

text_block_list.name: Referee Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Getting back on track then, it's a master and apprentice style 
rivalry, a feast for us all to enjoy! The showdown starts now!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Woooooh, here we go, Big T! Stir, stir, stir, and on you go, 
to simmer nice and slow! Bubble, bubble, bubble!
choice_data_list: Are you gonna do this for every step…?
Are you gonna do this for every step…?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
W-What's wrong with that. It's about getting in the mood. 
Don't you think it's more fun that way?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Why don't you get started as well? 
Show me those skills of yours!

—— Carrying on like that, our two dishes 
were soon lined up on the table.

text_block_list.name: Referee Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: The time to taste the results has come! First up is ma'am's trainer, who has made a honey-covered carrot gratin with plentiful cheese.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Nnwhaaaaaat!? You went and sold out, didn't ya, Big T! 
Cramming everyone's favorites together to appeal to them!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: You darn junk food cheeeef! Tch, anyway, get tasting already!

text_block_list.name: Referee Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: On it! Munch, munch… Mm, delicious! It's like I'm becoming one with this cheese～♪

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Geh, I want a bite too… Actually, no! 
This is a matter of pride.

text_block_list.name: Referee Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Moving on to Ma'am Amazon's dish! Simmered pumpkin and ground meat?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
That's right! It's a new dish I learned from a book. 
It might look plain, but, well, have a taste.

text_block_list.name: Referee Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Of course. Munch, munch… !! This tastes like…!!

text_block_list.name: Referee Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Nothing!! It tastes just as bland as it looks!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Hey now, you don't have to be so blunt about it! Uuuuugh～ 
I guess it lacks impact compared to Big T's junk food.

text_block_list.name: Referee Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Ah, but… hang on a moment. 
This taste……

text_block_list.name: Referee Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
It's bland for sure, but there's something… like a warm feeling… 
gradually spreading inside me……

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Ohh, looks like you picked up on the secret of my cooking!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: You have a bite too, T. I guarantee it'll hit home for you too.

I put a piece of pumpkin in my mouth. A delicious and gentle 
flavor slowly spread through my body……

This is more than delicious, this dish was clearly made with care 
for the person eating it. Which is more or less what I told her…

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
L-Lay off it! We're rivals, you know! 
You're making it hard to keep a straight face here!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
But you're right. I like cooking a lot. That is to say, it's not 
so much about making food…

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
I like providing energy and support through good, healthy food. 
And that includes for you, Big T!

text_block_list.name: Referee Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Be-beep! We've come to a verdict. The winner of this food showdown iiis ——

text_block_list.name: Referee Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Both of you because it was all tasty!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: What'd ya say!? It was clearly shaping up to be my victory!

text_block_list.name: Referee Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Eeeeh, weeeell, can you blame us? 
That gooey cheesy deliciousness was irresistible♪

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Ugh, I can't believe you're falling for such an obvious scheme. 
Why don't you just go post food pics on Umasta or something!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
But now what, Big T～ How are we supposed to settle 
our big battle if it ends in a draw like this…!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
A rematch…? Oh! You're right! If this time's a draw, then we 
can just do it again. It's not like we're parting ways.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Hahah, I won't lose to you, Big T! You and I might be partners, 
but in the kitchen we're rivals!

Hishi Amazon looked delighted to have found herself a worthy 
opponent in one of her fields of interest. Contrary to her outward 
personality, the food she likes is full of gentle flavors.
